instructions: Image titled View Your Recent Activity on LinkedIn on Android Step 1 1 Open the LinkedIn app. This looks like a blue box with IN inside in white letters. Image titled View Your Recent Activity on LinkedIn on Android Step 2 2 Tap your picture. Your picture is located in the upper left corner of the screen. Tapping it opens a menu. Image titled View Your Recent Activity on LinkedIn on Android Step 3 3 Tap under your picture and name. This will take you to your profile. Image titled View Your Recent Activity on LinkedIn on Android Step 4 4 Tap in your Dashboard. This is called the Posts, Articles, and more button. Image titled View Your Recent Activity on LinkedIn on Android Step 5 5 Tap . You will see a list of all your recent activity, such as your likes, comments, and posts. Advertisement
